All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter, org.apache.shiro.util.Nameable, org.apache.shiro.web.filter.PathConfigProcessor
public class ClientPermissionsAuthorizationFilter
extends org.apache.shiro.web.filter.authz.PermissionsAuthorizationFilter

This class specializes the PermissionsAuthorizationFilter to have a login url which is the redirection url to the provider.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Jerome Leleu
